detail_desc: Small shoulder bag in imitation leather with a metal chain shoulder strap and flap with a twist lock metal fastener. Outer compartment in a contrasting pattern and one inner compartment. Lined. Size approx. 4.5x15x20 cm.
Hard smartphone case. Fits iPhone 6/6s/7/8.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Cold shoulder jumpsuit in cotton seersucker with elastication and a flounce at the top and narrow shoulder straps. Diagonal side pockets and an elasticated seam at the waist with a decorative bow.
Strapless dress in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise, elastication at the top and a smocked waist. Lined.

Rubber backpack with a textured front. A handle at the top, padded, adjustable shoulder straps, two main compartments with two-way zips and three inner compartments, one in mesh with a zip. Lined. Size approx. 15x31x48 cm.

Flared dress in an airy viscose weave with a small frill trim, V-shaped opening and ties at the neckline. 3/4-length raglan sleeves with narrow elastication and a small frill trim at the cuffs, and gathered seams at the waist and around the skirt for added width. Unlined.
Knee-length dress in a crêpe weave with a V-neck, smocked seam under the bust and long sleeves with smocking at the cuffs. Partly lined.
Push-up bra in lace with underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Suede boots with an ankle-height shaft, lacing at the front, a loop at the back, moccasin seams and a decorative welt seam around the soles. Leather linings and insoles and chunky soles made from thermoplastic rubber (TPR). Heel 3 cm.

Short skirt in lightweight, fast-drying functional fabric layered over short sports tights. The skirt has a wide, bonded waistband with a scalloped edge that holds in and shapes the waist. The sports tights have a handy mobile phone pocket on one leg. Some of the polyester content of the skirt is recycled.
Long-sleeved dresses in printed cotton jersey with a seam at the hips and flounced skirt.
Ballet pumps with scalloped edges. Satin linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.

Soft, non-wired lace bra with moulded, lightly padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, an elasticated trim at the hem and a fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
Poncho in woven fabric with a fringed hem. Width 135 cm, length at the back 78 cm.
Hat in a soft knit with a decorative pompom on top, ribbed hem and earflaps. Thermal fleece lining.
Fully lined, pull-on trousers in a patterned cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets. Tapered legs with seams at the knees and elasticated hems. Jersey lining.
Double-layered hat in a soft, fine knit.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood with a wrapover front. Long sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Gently fitted, pattern-weave jacket with notch lapels, gathered, 3/4-length sleeves, jetted side pockets and a single back vent. No fasteners. Lined.
Tailored trousers woven in a stretch cotton blend with a concealed zip in the side and fake back pocket. Straight tapered legs with creases and short slits at the hems.
Long-sleeved top in soft jersey with a deep neckline at the front and a practical inner top for easier nursing access.

V-neck poplin blouse in Tencel™ lyocell and linen with a wrapover front with a concealed hook and eye fastener and concealed press-studs. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with a decorative button at the cuffs and a detachable tie belt at the waist.
Leggings in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with an elasticated waist. One pair with an all-over print. The cotton content of the leggings is organic.

Calf-length dress in cotton crêpe with narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a scalloped trim at the top. Buttons down the front, smocking at the back and a seam at the waist with a flared skirt. Unlined.
Cap in cotton twill with an adjustable metal fastener at the back.
Sleeveless top in soft viscose jersey with a racer back that has a crocheted section in the shape of a butterfly at the top. Slightly longer at the back.
Metal hoop earrings decorated with sparkly stones. Diameter 4.5 cm.
Top in soft cotton jersey with short butterfly sleeves. Front in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise. Narrow ribbing around the neckline.

prod_name: Oz skinny fit crop foldup trs
detail_desc: Ankle-length suit trousers in woven fabric with a zip fly, hook-and-eye fastener and concealed button. Side pockets, welt back pockets and legs with creases and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Skinny Fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Small shoulder bag with a concealed magnetic fastener and a flap with a decorative metal ring. Two-part inner compartment and a shoulder strap with a chain fastening. Lined. Size 5.5x14.5x21.5 cm.
Balconette bra in lace with underwired, padded cups that lift and shape the bust, adjustable shoulder straps, a hook-and-eye fastening at the back and a wide lace trim at the hem.
Trousers in an airy viscose weave with elastication and a decorative bow at the waist, side pockets and tapered legs with elasticated hems.
Shorts in lightweight organic cotton sweatshirt fabric. Elasticated waistband with a drawstring, and diagonal side pockets.

Jacket in soft fleece designed to be worn as a thermal mid layer. High collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, and jersey trims at the cuffs and hem. Rounded and slightly longer at the back. Unlined. The jacket is made from partly recycled polyester.
Blouse in a patterned crêpe weave with a V-neck and wrapover front with a concealed button and hook-and-eye fastening. Ties at one side and 3/4-length sleeves with a frill trim.
Short, fitted top in ribbed jersey with an angular neckline and short sleeves.
Fine-knit socks in a soft organic cotton blend.

Lightly padded parka in cotton twill with a pile-lined hood with a detachable faux fur trim, a zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front and a drawstring at the waist and hem. Flap front pockets with a press-stud, elastication and a tab and press-stud at the cuffs and a single back vent. Pile lining.
Sports jacket in fast-drying functional fabric with a mesh-lined hood and zip down the front. Long raglan sleeves, front pockets, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Unlined.
Boxer shorts in cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.

Set with a hoodie and pair of trousers in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Hoodie with a drawstring hood, dropped shoulders, long sleeves with ribbing at the cuffs, and high slits in the sides. Trousers with a wide elastication and a drawstring at the waist. The polyester content of the set is recycled.
Baby Exclusive. Trousers in organic cotton with an elasticated waist, decorative buttons at the front and side pockets.
Loose-fitting sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back. Semi-transparent ribbed section at the top of the back and down the sides.

Dungaree shorts in an airy organic cotton weave with buttons at the top and frill-trimmed straps that cross at the back. Elasticated seam at the back of the waist and a lined lower section. Narrow elastication and a frill trim around the hems, and press-studs at the crotch.
Sleeveless top in jersey with a shimmering finish. Slightly deeper neckline and raw edges around the neckline and armholes.

Short, straight-cut dress in woven fabric with a small stand-up collar and V-neck opening at the top. Dropped shoulders, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Elasticated scrunchie in wide-wale corduroy velour.
Jumpsuit in heavily draping jersey with a wrapover top, long sleeves, elasticated seam at the waist and long, straight legs.
5-pocket denim jeans with a regular waist, zip fly and button and slim legs. Made using Lycra® Freefit® technology for soft, super-generous stretch, maximum mobility and optimal comfort.
Longer hooded top in soft fleece with appliqués and embroidery. Long raglan sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft and fluffy inside.
Tunic in an airy viscose weave with a collar, concealed button placket and side pockets. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.

Jacket in an airy, crinkled viscose weave with a deep V-neck and twisted ties at the front. Low dropped shoulders, 3/4-length sleeves and a decorative, crocheted, tasselled trim around the waist. Inset, ladder-stitched trims at the cuffs and hem.
Dungarees in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with adjustable straps that fasten at the front. Elastication at the back of the waist and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Jumper in a soft rib knit containing some mohair.
Trousers in a crinkled organic cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and elasticated hems.
Short dress in woven fabric with a small stand-up collar and 3/4-length sleeves with flared cuffs.
3/4-length leggings in sturdy scuba fabric with a sheen. Elasticated waist and sewn-in creases front and back.

Popover jacket in a crisp, shimmering metallic nylon weave. Mesh-lined hood with an elastic drawstring, a zip at the top with a chin guard, and a loose, ventilating yoke at the back. Long raglan sleeves with wide elastication at the cuffs, a kangaroo pocket and a concealed, elasticated drawstring at the hem. Mesh lining.
Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Top in sturdy, stretch fabric with a sweetheart neckline. Concealed elastication over the shoulders, short puff sleeves and a straight hem.
Trousers in soft cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake side pockets and elasticated hems.
Pile jacket with a detachable, jersey lined hood with ears on the top and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Jersey lining.
Short-sleeved, round-necked T-shirt in jersey made from a cotton blend.

Padded softshell jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with folded seams, a detachable hood and fleece-lined, stand-up collar. Zip down the front with a chin guard, zipped front pockets with taped seams and ribbed cuffs. Lined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Top in slub-weave jersey with a reversible-sequin motif on the front (normal sequins in size 1½-3Y) and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Slightly longer at the back.
Ankle-length cigarette trousers in patterned stretch cotton satin with a regular waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Side pockets and tapered legs with slits at the hems.
Pool shoes with a padded foot strap and moulded soles that are fluted underneath.
Push-up microfibre bra with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and narrow, decorative straps at the front. No fasteners.
Wide, cropped jersey T-shirt with a print motif on the front.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with a wrapover front and press-studs down one side and at the crotch.
Sports shorts in crisp, fast-drying functional fabric. High waist with wide, covered elastication and an elastic drawstring, and side pockets.
Jumper in a soft textured knit containing some wool with a polo neck, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Cropped vest top in sturdy, ribbed jersey with a slight sheen.
Boxy-style jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Regular fit.

Fleece-lined set with a hat and pair of mittens in a soft cable knit. Hat with a faux fur pompom on top, small imitation suede appliqué on the front, earflaps and ties under the chin. Mittens with ribbed cuffs. Sizes 0-2M and 2-6M without thumbs.
Metal earrings with round pendants in marbled plastic. Length 8 cm.
